Remove an transfer descriptor from transfer queue.

u8 hcdi_enqueue ( usb_transfer_descriptor *  td  ) 

hcdi_enqueue takes usb_irp and split it into several usb packeges (SETUP,IN,OUT) In the usbstack they are transported with the usb_transfer_descriptor data structure.
